description:
On January 2, Najimi calls up all their friends and hears about all the different ways they welcomed in the new year.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just Everyone`s New Years. / It`s Just Ice Skating. / It`s Just a Cold.
Sorezore no Oshougatsu Desu. / Ice Skate Desu. / Kaze Desu.
To tylko Nowy Rok dla wszystkich. I więcej.
それぞれのお正月です. / アイススケートです. / 風邪です.
